Lunarpine grinned,"Alright, I'll sign us out a pod and we can be on 
our wa=
y." The wolfbot had mixxed emotions about the new bot but 
decided he'd do =
anything to get away from the monotany of repair 
duty. 

He found a pod, a=
ctivated its start up procedure, logged in that the 
two bots were taking i=
t.
"Ok RebelYell we're all set come aboard and we'll be off."

He opened a =
comm to Shadow Wing and Spears "Take good care of the 
place you two." he w=
anted to invite Shadow Wing along but the thought 
wasn't practicle. Rebely=
ell and Lunarpine could handle the pod.
